issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in AnnoyancesFilter (mobile-app_specific.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are multiple duplicate rules in the filters.

- [ ] #$?##smartbanner { remove: true; }
- [ ] ##section[data-qa="download-app-section" 
- [ ] ##div[class^="PseudoSmartBanner_"]  
- [ ] ##article > div[class^="wrapper_"]:has(> a[href^="https://redirect.appmetrica.yandex.com/"])  
- [ ] ##a[href^="https://app.adjust.com/"]  
- [ ] #%#//scriptlet('set-cookie', 'tc:dismissexitintentpopup', 'true') 
- [ ] halotracker.com##.app-promo-section  
- [ ] hinative.com##.mod_banner_app_download_sticky_button  
- [ ] nicovideo.jp###jsSmartAppBanner
- [ ] nicovideo.jp##.launch_app_container
- [ ] yahoo.co.jp###bosaiapp

 
```
togetter.com###appdl_header
posfie.com###appdl_header
```

```
baseball.yahoo.co.jp,soccer.yahoo.co.jp,sports.yahoo.co.jp##.sn-modAppText
baseball.yahoo.co.jp##.sn-modAppText
```

### Proposed solution

Merge or remove rules if possible.



### Additional information

_No response_

pull_request.title: Merge duplicate rules mobile app specific
pull_request.body:
## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

 

### Add your comment and screenshots

Cleanup duplicate rules

- [ ] ##div[data-test-id="appsBannerContainer"]
- [ ] #%#//scriptlet('set-local-storage-item', 'isPromoHidden', 'true')
- [ ] #%#//scriptlet('set-cookie', 'smartbanner-closed', 'true')
- [ ] ##.open-app-banner
- [ ] ##.ctaopenapp
- [ ] ##.app-button
- [ ] ##.app-banner
- [ ] ###js-appeal-top-banner  
- [ ] bushikaku.net##.fixed-bottom-app-banner
- [ ] yaplakal.com###android-app 



### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: Cleanup duplicate rules in SpanishFilter (specific.txt)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

There are multiple duplicate rules in the filters.

- [ ]  ###bloco-native-rodape
- [ ]  ##.a300x250
- [ ]  ##.bannerTopHeader 
- [ ]  ##.coluna-propaganda 
- [ ]  ##.layout-rev 
- [ ]  ##.widget-shopping 
- [ ]  ##div[class^="ad-slot_"] 
- [ ]  ##div[class^="publicidade-"] 

 
```
okpeliz.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-window-open')
anime-jl.net#%#//scriptlet('prevent-window-open')
player.malfollado.com#%#//scriptlet('prevent-window-open')
```

### Proposed solution

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV16w411j74G/?spm_id_from=333.337.search-card.all.click&vd_source=dc5d52dd7afc70db4e6c133bf77a446a](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilibili.com%2Fvideo%2FBV16w411j74G%2F%3Fspm_id_from%3D333.337.search-card.all.click%26vd_source%3Ddc5d52dd7afc70db4e6c133bf77a446a) ### Comment > 浏览器扩展打开adguard，不更改adguard的任何设置，打开bilibili网站播放视频后无法正常播放，会一直卡在加载中。暂时解决办法是在adguard的白名单里添加bilibili.com ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/qyyzm405e40o0gwsw8kckgcsg80kg4w5wydd8ajgzc.jpg?nc=1)
